TARGET.description: base url you want to proxy, e.g. api.example.com

CORS_ORIGIN.description: true/false or comma-separated allowed cors origins, e.g. staging.example.com

COOKIE_DOMAIN_REWRITE.description: false or comma-separated source:target, e.g. www.example.com:staging.example.com

COOKIE_STRIP_SECURE.description: should only be used on localhost
